description.p: Improved update experience and home page enhancements:

ul.li: Update All button now refreshes automatically after completing all updates.
Added loading indicator when checking for updates to prevent confusion.
Fixed issue where the update count wouldn't refresh after closing the update dialog.
Better visual feedback with spinner while verifying available updates.
Featured section now displays as an interactive carousel with multiple highlighted apps.
Improved image loading with skeleton placeholders to prevent showing outdated images.
Renamed "Featured" section to "Spotlight" for better clarity.
Added developer badges to installed app cards for easier app identification.
Developer information is automatically extracted from app IDs without additional API calls.
